meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>simplify a fraction of fraction sums with variables</term>. Think of starting with <inline-math/> and eventually reducing it to <inline-math/>. This includes adding the various fractions (above and below) together into a single fraction, and then simplifying the resulting fraction of fractions. The skill does not require the cancellation of potential polynomial fractions afterwards.</par>
